channel.title: [Request] Need a forums Banner [Request]
channel.description:
I'm gonna be as specific as I possibly can.
I want a banner for my forums. I need It to say "Fallout-Pkz" without the quotes in it, with a decorative text. I'd like it to not look gay though. The background, I'd like a vengence skull, with the color set to negative, like were it's the opposite color of the real veng skull. Then a decorative background behind it, that matches the skull's color. I'd like if it had a darker tone to it also.
If you can do this idea, please do. If you think you can do something better than this though, please do.
Thanks for the help. Time of Rune

item.title: [Request] Need a forums Banner [Request]

item.description:
@time_of_rune wrote:

Oo, thanks server unknown. I lyk et. cant wait untill it’s made in a program

item.title: [Request] Need a forums Banner [Request]
item.dc:creator: @Server-Unknown.Net Server-Unknown.Net
item.description:
@Server-Unknown.Net wrote:

How about you provide a skull for us cuz I don’t know what it looks like >.>…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 28, 2009, 09:08:47 pm[/size][hr]Hey, well I assume no one will do it… Hardly anyone does something like this anyway, so Ill do it for you (no one else ask me for one or ill ignore request!). Im only doing this cuz i got time for today and tomorrow, ur lucky I cant go by my girlfriends house lol:\

Tell me how u like so far

Read full topic
